document.full_text: unable to draw on the strength of the williams sisters, the united states failed to win a single match against germany and was knocked from the top tier of the fed cup for the first time.
document.title: u.s. loses to germany, bounced from fed cup top tier
lines_and_colors: unable to draw on the strength of the williams sisters, the united states failed to win a single match against germany and was knocked from the top tier of the fed cup for the first time.
